title: kayn skin
body:
when does kayn get a new skin? im lvl 7 whit kayn and i really want a new , very nice skin. i cant belive roit who cant create a new good skin. there is a lot of idea. pls do a new skin. Thanks in advance




who too want a new kayn skin?

replies.body: I mean i've been asking for kled to get a skin. hes been out since 2015 with no skin. sooooooo hold your horses T^T
Hes been out since the 10th of august 2016, but i agree with the rest.
{{champion:164}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:136}}  all release prior to kayn. All havent gotten a 2nd skin yet

What do you not like about good old red Gehrman? He seems like a decent skin for me.

In all seriousness now (that's hard for me) I think that dark star will be a good one. But you know. They can't make crossovers in the skin lines so as far as I would like Dark Star and Star Gurdian mash up it won't happen. So I guess we have to stick with the unique skins for him. Back to bloodborne I guess (See! I told you I cannot be serious)
